participant_1.background:
I'm from the streets, but I'm trying to change my ways.
I am still single, because I have been on my own for too long, to give my heart away to just anyone.
i have created my own personal religion.
My suburban is great for hauling home improvement supplies, but the weather's not cooperating.
my favorite artist is 2pac.

participant_2.background:
I made many memories with my family last year.
i am married to a man.
I start my morning with a walk around the neighborhood to get some fresh air and see what's going on at the local shops.
I once worked as a circus freak, showing off my third thumb to the public.
i have a marketing job.

content.text: Hey! What are you up to?
Not much! Just got home from a walk around the neighborhood.
What do you do for work?
I work in marketing! I love it!
What's your favorite part about your job?
I love coming up with new ideas and seeing them come to life.
That's awesome! I'm an artist, so I know what you mean.
Wow, that's so cool! I've always wanted to learn how to paint.
It's really fun! You should give it a try.
Maybe I will! What kind of art do you like to create?
I mostly do portraits, but I also like to do landscapes and abstract art.
That's so cool! I'd love to see some of your work sometime.
Sure! I'll send you some links.
